text: Love is like a fart. If you have to force it, it's probably crap.
I guess we've learned that no matter who you are or where you come from, life is a terrible thing.
When I set my mind to something, anything's possible.
I have an idea so smart that my head would explode if I even began to know what I was talking about.
Face it, I'm a bad husband, a lousy father, and a snappy dresser.

This is what you call life. Therefore go and enjoy yourself. What is correct for you might not be correct for others. You take both bad as well as good, and there, my opening assertion comes true. Ubu, sit down, good pooch.
Whatever kills me makes me stronger.
I'm not the smartest man in the world, but I can always look back on my life and say I went for it.
Now I may be an idiot, but there's one thing I am not, sir, and that, sir, is an idiot.
